overview:
15 years business development experience, 10+ Fortune 500 companies, multiple awards

Jamey has a spent the last 15 years focusing on business development in multiple channels from the CPG industry to mobile software, domaining and social gaming. He has worked with many top companies such as Facebook, Tapjoy, Jawa, Procter and Gamble, HJ Heinz, Ocean Spray and many others. He has managed various sizes of teams across industries and geographies. Jamey has achieved awards for Innovation, Resource Management, and Team Development. Most recently, Jamey has been involved with Digital Madhouse Studios as Director of Business Development.
